description.narrative: To create the adequate conditions in the Borrower's SNIA in order to support the effectiveness of its member organizations in providing or developing improved agricultural technologies.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement: INIA should become a Specialized Technical Organization | Description :Six months after effectiveness INIA willhave submitted the request to MINAGRI to be transformed into Specialized Technical Organism. By mid-term review, INIA will submitevidence of its status as a Specialized Technical Organism, with an organogram in which the Technical Secretariat of the SNIAreports directly to the Head of INIA. | Due Date :12-Nov-2017

Finance Agreement: PIU will be established by effectiveness | Description :By effectiveness, INIA will have created the ProjectImplementation Unit and have it staffed with a minimum of 7 professionals (Executive Director, Operations Director, Head ofAdministration, Head of Policy Unit, Head of Market for Innovation Services Unit, Finance Management Specialist, ProcurementSpecialist). | Due Date :15-Nov-2014
